about.info: I am a highly skilled front-end developer passionate about technology,  with 3 years of experience working with Angular and React. I have a strong understanding of front-end development concepts, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and advanced DOM manipulation techniques. Additionally,  I possess skills in other crucial areas of web development such as UI/UX design, accessibility, and web performance. I am capable of creating  responsive, visually appealing, and highly functional user interfaces, utilizing the latest frameworks and technologies. I have a solid grasp  of agile methodologies and am constantly seeking to enhance my front-end knowledge and skills by engaging with industry-related communities and  events. I am open to new challenges and job opportunities in exciting  projects that demand excellence in front-end development.
about.info.extra: When I'm not coding, I enjoy playing video games, watching movies, and playing with my dog. I also enjoy learning new things. I am currently learning about history and philosophy. I'm also learning how to play the guitar.
description.job.one: Actively participated in a significant system migration from Angular to React technology, enhancing application performance and ensuring functionality maintenance. Also responsible for maintaining Angular and .NET code during the migration process.
description.job.two: Developed advanced skills in React.js, TypeScript, and Node.js to build high-quality front-end applications at A.R.Phoenix. Designed and implemented scalable solutions for a seamless user experience and collaborated with back-end teams for API integration.
description.job.tree: Acquired advanced skills in React.js, TypeScript, and Node.js to develop high-quality front-end applications at Tools Software. Responsible for designing and implementing scalable solutions, ensuring a smooth user experience, and improving development efficiency.
description.job.four: Worked as a freelance Front End Developer, specializing in React.js and CSS. Developed projects using Styled-components, Bootstrap, and React Hooks.
